semantics.description: ENFORCED: in every interval where "(normal|homing)" holds. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (request_move_up) is true and any point in the interval where (request_move_up) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 200 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+200). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+200, then RES need not hold.

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in every interval where "(normal|homing)" holds. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (request_move_down) is true and any point in the interval where (request_move_down) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 200 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+200). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+200, then RES need not hold.

fulltext: The tube_motion_controller SHALL always SATISFY IF (tube_moving_upwards | tube_moving_downwards) THEN tube_moving

semantics.description:
ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution.
TRIGGER: first point in the interval.
REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at all time points between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.

fulltext: IN "(sample_prep|capture)" mode UPON request_illuminate_on illumination_control SHALL within 200 millisecond SATISFY (illumination_on & actual_brightness = configured_brightness & answer_request_ok)

semantics.diagramVariables: M = "(sample_prep|capture)", TC = (request_illuminate_on), n = 200, Response = (( illumination_on & actual_brightness = configured_brightness & answer_request_ok )).
semantics.description: ENFORCED: in every interval where "(sample_prep|capture)" holds. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (request_illuminate_on) is true and any point in the interval where (request_illuminate_on) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 200 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+200). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+200, then RES need not hold.
